help-tour-steps.content: Hello, and welcome to FIA! This tour will show you the important features of this application
Click here to sign in or sign out
Click here to see any notifications you may have
Click here to change the settings for cookies, dark/light mode and high-contrast mode
Click here to contact the support team with any issues or feedback
Click here to access the admin interface
Click here to open or close the navigation menu
Click here to see a list of all Instruments
Click here to see a list of all Reductions
Click here to read more about the ISIS Neutron and Muon Facilities
Click on each Instrument to expand and see info about it; from here you can also access all data reduction files for experiments on this specific Instrument.
Click here to Select All data reductions currently shown on the table.
Here you will find entries for data reductions performed on experiment data. They can be ordered by the columns, and filtered by many parameters.
